text:
Pengalaman menginap semalam di Sheraton menyenangkan dimana lokasi hotelnya sangat nyaman buat stay cation, sangat tenang juga. pelayanannya ramah sekali dan sangat membantu bahkan tanpa di minta mereka berinisiatif menawarkan bantuan ini sangat bagus dan menjadi nilai plus buat staff Sheraton Belitung.

Cuman mungkin ada beberapa catatan supaya bisa menjadi lebih baik lagi buat Sheraton Belitung Management, yaitu:

- Agak kecewa dengan tiba2 meniadakan menu Pizza pada saat Dinner saya kurang tahu kenapa hal ini terjadi apakah karena tamu yang ikut Package Dinner tiba2 jadi banyak jadi kurang prepare untuk Pizzanya atau keterbatasan staff karena pandemi. cuman yang saya note adlaah menu Pizza ini masih di promosikan di Instagram Story pada Tgl 31 dan memang maunya makan Pizza jg disamping memesan yang lainnya karena di Belitung ini susah buat cari Pizza yang enak.

- Rasa makanananya bagi saya (mungkin selera cita rasa saya berbeda) kurang pas dengan saya karena cenderung biasa aja untuk harga yang di tawarkan. Breakfastnya juga biasa aja, untuk pastrynya enak. apa karena ini baru soft opening jadi variasi juga disesuaikan?

- Untuk Toilet ada beberapa sarang laba2 di dekat closet mungkin karena sudah lama tidak di pakai karena pandemi, Teko pemanas air juga masih ada air pada saat saya mau gunakan, serta Sisir rambut yang di sediakan sudah berjamur.

ini hanya masukan dari sesama Hotelier juga, sehingga bisa memberikan yang terbaik lagi buat tamu2nya.kalo di tanya apakah mau menginap lagi disana? tentu saja saya mau, karena itu tadi saya suka Hotelnya, kamarnya serta staff2nya juga.

Terima Kasih

text:
We stayed for 2 nights at their island suite with lagoon view and are impressed by their beautiful location, super comfortable room and especially their customer service! 
The resort is located in the middle of a wildlife sanctuary, where there are several bike/hiking trails to explore. 
The room is super clean, nicely decorated and we especially love how comfortable the bed and pillows are. 
However what impressed us the most is their customer service. Mba indri, their guest service agent reached out a few days before our stay to make sure we will have everything we want/need during our stay, offered us upgrades and some activities during our stay. 
We also booked their sunset dinner cruise and experienced the most beautiful sunset ever! The food & drinks we ordered are also tasty. 
The only thing that confused us is the so called Lagoon in the middle of the resort which looks more like an unmaintained pond or dirty water puddles. And when the room titled suite with lagoon view is charged more expensive, we’d expect to get a more beautiful/pleasing view than this. It really ruins what otherwise a perfect resort. 
Overall we has an amazing stay and are definitely plan to come back.
title: Perfect eco resort for a peaceful getaway!

text:
Stayed here for three nights as a Bonvoy Titanium while attending a business conference and was accommodated in an Island Suite. The rooms were well appointed with comfortable beds and thoughtful furniture. There is even an outdoor soaking tub for guests who wish to relax while enjoying the natural air. It was a surreal experience to open the door to sandy paths and views of the Sheraton's inner lagoons. Guests were very close to a clean beach and the property had activities and facilities for a relaxing vacation (e.g., watersports). 

Service at the Sheraton was friendly and prompt from the front desk to the bellboys who operated the buggy carts with a smile. Guest Experience Manager Rani reached out ahead of time and offered a warm and personal welcome. Guest Services could arrange to send a suit for pressing even when I wasn't in my room. There were nice touches such as a welcome F&B amenity and nightly bites along with turn-down service. Our meals at the Sheraton's restaurants were of high-quality and the spa services were professional and had a local touch (e.g., pepper based oils).

I would certainly recommend the Sheraton Belitung Resort for anyone looking for a restful and enjoyable stay and look forward to returning.
title: Idyllic and Hidden Slice of Paradise

text: They have really nice services, view, and amenities. The staff is really kindful and helpful to maintain all we need. The food is so delicious ! And they really provide all your need, just call the staff and they would do ASAP.
title: Wonderful, perfect, i would come back to stay here in another business occasion or maybe just a short stay for refresh

photos.caption: The room is so nice, always clean by the housekeeping, warm feeling, and close to nature, like we come back to nature and feeling comfortable with the facilities, they really cover all your need
The food is really good, they provide many kinds of food from local food, indonesian, western, and oriental
They cover all your need especially for business thing, the ballroom is perfect for event
They also have seafood market that is perfect to be a small-close to nature event, really close to the sea but would’nt disturb your talks

text: The property is located in a quiet corner of the island so it would be an ideal place to relax. They also have several activities such as kayaking and paddling. The service is also excellent and they always have a smile on their face - special mention goes to Maya who assisted me with the check-out. text:
My friend and I went to Belitung last weekend and stayed at this beautiful resort for 2 days. A few days before our arrival, Ibu Rani reached us out asking about our arrival details and preference which really enhanced our stay experience even before our arrival. Smooth check-in process, friendly staff, very spacious and beautiful lobby.

As the resort is far from the city, we decided to stay in the resort and do some in-house activities. They offered a lot of activities but I chose tour to honey farm and water treatment facilities, Ketupat making class, and Belitung language class that fit in our schedule. All the class was super FUN and I would like to thank Santra for taking us around the resort, Bu Rini for showing us how to make ketupat, Henry for teaching us the local Belitung language, and Andarwati for taking a special care during our dinner at the restaurant. Food was great!

Shout out to Pak Amin, Pak Refly, and Pak Marcel who was very humble, warm and friendly also! Can't wait to go back to Belitung.
title: THE BEST RESORT!

text:
Sheraton Belitung is not only the most luxurious resort on Belitung Island, but also outperforms the services of many destinations luxury brands. I spent an unforgettable half a month here and felt the sincere hospitality. White sand beaches and calm seas are beautiful. Here offered guests to sail to the islands and fishing,take part in forest Tours, explore of the Belitung land, thanks to Rani and the Akbar who recommended the trip for me. Island restaurant serves fresh juice and local cuisine every day, and thanks to Ririn, Susi and all the other staff, we get along as friends. The most luxurious hotels offer superior relationships and polite service. They do it better than some of Ritz-Carlton's!
I recommend it to people who want to get away from the noisy destinations, who like peace and quiet, and who like to explore unknown destinations. 
Family vacations, honeymoons, parties, solo trips, conferences are all good choices.
title: A luxury resort worthy of vacation and exploration

text: Great location, amazing customer service, good price, everything one can hope for. We were not at all disappointed. We cannot wait to go back to Sheraton Belitung. The best customer service we have found anywhere. Thanks so much to the staff ❤️

text:
We had a fantastic stay! From the moment we arrive to the moment we leave, everyone couldnt have been more helpful or more friendly.

We didn’t know what to expect out of Belitung, it was our first time visiting the island and we were pleasantly surprised by the gorgeous nature, picturesque beaches and islands, and how there is no traffic!! It’s like finding Bali 20 years ago and was the relaxing escape we wanted.

The resort was spacious enough that it never felt crowded, we stayed in the suite and it was beautiful and generously sized, beachside pool is the perfect place to spend the day away, and food at the restaurant was good and always served with a smile.

We also did the forest trekking and the spa offered by the hotel. The guide for the forest trekking was a clear enthusiast of his field which made our experience all the better - make sure you try the fresh honey right out the hive! The massages after the trekking was the perfect way to relax after all the forest walking and cycling.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

Pizza was good and the burger as well, but the fries on the side also came out cold. They want to order oxtail soup but the waitress said they needed to wait for 2 hours??? text:
We stayed 3 nights in the Island Executive Suite which the hotel staff had kindly upgraded considering my Elite status. We had two small kids with us. Overall the experience was splendid and the staff was extremely courteous. The Island Hopping activity arrangement was wonderful. The staff on the boat get 7 stars for their outgoing services. 
It's a relatively new hotel so something's will settle down with time like all day restaurant had limited options especially vegetarian. Although Chef Iman and his team made sure we were fed with delicious food considering we are vegetarians. But variety needs to be more to be at par with similar Sheraton or other 5 star properties. I think the kids club will eventually shift to a larger room which currently was a makeshift. 
Staff's services were just splendid and they did whatever they can to make you feel comfortable. 
Housekeeping was great but still can improve a little bit. 
This was my birthday stay and both the front staff and housekeeping staff went overboard in making our stay special.
All in all we had good fun and we would strongly recommend our friends to visit Sheraton Belitung. Special mention of Rani, Andarwati, Riaan, Ririn, Henry for exceptional services. Keep up the good work
Cheers

In short it was magical. We stayed 3 days and would visit again in a heartbeat. The hospitality is second to none, professional and completely genuine. The rooms are stunning, faultlessly clean and more than comfortable. Breakfast is a feast and the all day dining exceeds expectation with the food freshly cooked and delicious.

All in all this hotel made our stay, particularly the staff. We didnt even venture round the island but felt no need to given the amentities and service. Book and you won't regret it!

text:
I stayed at Sheraton Belitung Resort, room number 2206 for 3 nights from 19 Dec - 22 Dec. 

Hotel overview: Really love the hotel ambience, design, and private beach. It's just a very nice place to relax and the property is really well maintained. Buggy's service is also available throughout the resort at any time.

Staff: The staff at this property are all great. Shout out to Rani & Daniel from guest experience team who has been really thoughtful throughout my stay. Rani was kind enough to check on me 3 days due to my arrival if any celebration set up needed or anything needed during my stay.
Daniel also has been really responsive during our stay. He answer all of our queries during stay very fast.
Also to Amin from Island restaurant team who has been really friendly to us and make us feel like home during our dinner.
To all staff who I didn't have the chance to ask their name, they all done a very great job.

Rooms: Rooms layout is very nice and spacious. Air conditioner works really well. Bed is comfortable and big. Amenities all good. The only thing to note is to take more attention of the bathtub cause my room's bathtub's tap is really rusty.

Restaurant: Will give Island Restaurant 1000 out of 10. The food is just amazing. I've tried breakfast and dinner and it all suit my taste. The food is a simple one but really rich in flavor and price wise is also really make sense. Will definitely come back.

Overall, I had a great experience with my stay and highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Belitung.
title: Hidden Gem Property in Belitung

text:
Stayed for a long weekend, and had a very relaxing time in a beautiful location with good facilities. The highlight was the beautiful beach directly in front of the resort, sitting on the smooth white sand watching the sun go down. 

The rooms are a good size, very comfortable bed, robes, with a outdoor bath on the balcony. The Ocean View rooms are on level 1, with the Lagoon Rooms on the ground floor. The suites are very large, with an adjoining room with sofa and chairs and additional bathroom. 

The restaurant food is excellent, particularly the pizza which is made in the pizza oven. The food did take a long time to come and the dishes would arrive at different times. Breakfast buffet included freshly made eggs. 

We asked the front desk to organise island hopping and it was very easy. Island hopping was very close to the Sheraton and we saw many beautiful landscape and snorkeling was great. 

On the Friday night there was a function at the restaurant is was incredibly loud, even back in the rooms.
title: Relaxing weekend on a stunning white sand beach

The most disgraceful experience after two years living in Indonesia. This place is an absolute shame for the whole Marriott group globally. I wish I could see the faces of the ministers that will be staying here in a few weeks time for G20.

Don’t take me wrong. The actual location is absolutely wonderful, only the most terrible service (and food) could ruin such setting.

Room was in unacceptable cleaning conditions (human hair on the bed, dirty floor, and even dirtier windows). Do not expect room service or anything else you need to reach your room before 1 hour wait. AC did not work properly, the room was freezing and we woke up with a sore throat. 

Food offer was the lowlight in all this. After a lower-than-average dinner, we could not eat anything for breakfast, not even the most basic products. Blueberry jam felt like it was chemically reproduced in a lab, all fruit was close to rotten, only cheap supermarket snacks as pastry.

Through the hotel we rented a boat for island hopping, where staff was feeding fish to attract them close to the boat and show us how beautiful they are. It’s 2022 Sheraton/Marriott… You got to be kidding.

While checking out after just one night (from the three we were supposed to stay) the manager promised us she will make up for it by inviting us back. Unless the direction plans some major changes to the management, kitchen, and staff in general, that rather sounds like an extra punishment.
title: A global shame for the Marriott group

This is my first hotel review, EVER. But the Sheraton Belitung hotel staff have my it one of the best family holidays that we've had.

The front office staff, lead by Dewa Mahendra and Taupan, were incredibly welcoming and made sure our every need was taken care of. They shared us their WhatsApp number in case we had any questions or concerns or anything else. Their response was almost instant. For example, they were very helpful in printinv our PCR test results at 12 at night, for our early morning flight. 

Then there is the restaurant staff. An amazing set of people that really do everything to make their guests feel appreciated. Meal customisation, off menu requests, they did everything to make sure we had the best experience possible. Pro tip; the pizzas were some of the best we've eaten here in Indonesia. 

Finally, there was Pak Wahyu, the onsite partner that arranges the activities. Kayaking, island hopping without any worries at all. On top of that, he spent time making necklaces and an amazing piece of art for our 2 children, which they will cherish as memories from our trip forever. Then there was the hotel itself, with only 5 meters from swimming pool to white sand beach, the ultimate playground for our kids. 

The only drawback is that the garden upkeep has been kept to a minimum, but with such amazing staff, that is something that doesn't matter anymore. Also, since the hotel is remote, expect to eat in the restaurant alot.

Would recommend to anyone.
title: Best hotel staff, ever.

Upon arrival, we received a warm welcome by Yvonne Wan (general manager) and Lalu Taupan (guest relation manager). Everything was very fine and the price-performance-ration is good. The restaurant food is also of high quality. However, it is rather over-priced, especially compared to the rest of the island. The hotel pool and beach are particularly remarkable! The pool is really large and great to swim in or just to relax in the sun with the restaurant close by. During our stay it was amazing because the white beach was very clean and we had it all to ourselves. From there, you can also take a walk along the most beautiful beaches with the incredible stone formations. Or you can easily rent a motor bike via the hotel to visit some of the island’s sights like the famous Tanjung Tinggi Beach, that is really close by. At this point we would like to thank Eric from the restaurant for the amazing island tour he gave us and of course also for the great service by the restaurant team. The rooms are very modern and we had great housekeeping from Rudi and Erika. Finally, the reception team with Greysa, Vanessa, Suvin, Josephine and Stevie and also the Rooms Division Manager Debby were very friendly and helpful. text:
Just completed a great 1 week stay here. Well worth the trip despite the hassles of domestic travel in Indonesia at the moment. I looked at most properties in the west/north-west and the Sheraton is undoubtedly the highest standard and best beach location if that's what you're looking for.
The location is in the north-west of the island very close to some of the prime attractions like Pulau Lengkuas and Pantai Tanjung Tinggi.  It's on a private bay, facing towards the sunset, book ended by ancient granite rock outcrops and with a white sand beach that's as good as any I've seen in Indonesia. The beach is great for swimming and snorkeling with warm water, little current and reefs offshore, turtles and sometimes dolphins. Easy access for island hopping tours from the beach.  When you've had enough of the salt water, the big pool is just above the beach.
The resort itself only opened in Sep 2019 so everything is new and immaculate. The lobby is very striking, making an immediate impression upon arrival.  The rooms (we stayed in an Ocean View) are generously sized and well equipped. They're blessed with a great view all day, especially sunset, and were worth the extra cost for the joy of sitting in bed or on the balcony with the view across the man-made lagoons to the ocean and islands. 
The "Seafood Market" restaurant will open later, however "The Island" restaurant was excellent for all meals, with both indoor and outdoor seating depending on you preference and time of day/heat. Food quality was top notch, with an extremely generous breakfast included - currently weekend buffet (not self service) and other days a la carte. Lunch/dinner is from the menu, or even special order if they can accommodate (excellent whole grilled fish and pasta arabiata for instance), and priced equivalent to good restaurants as you'd expect for this standard. If you have transport there are many warung, such as at Pantai Tanjung Tinggi (5 mins) or Tandjung Pandan city (30 mins).
Staff were friendly and attentive all round. Reception made booking hotel services easy and they were all professionally run and with good quality equipment.  We used car hire with driver; airport transfers; island hopping in the hotel's very comfortable boat (flat platform, cushions, snacks, water); canoeing; and snorkeling. Our driver, Pak Wawan, was excellent both in driving and showing us the sites of Tandjung Pandan (~4hrs) and the places we wanted to see in east Belitung (~9hrs).
We still have some things to see in Belitung so would love to return and stay here again.
title: Best hotel and beach location in Belitung

text:
Me and my family had an amazing time in Sheraton Belitung.

We did not know about Belitung, a friend of mine told me about it and we decided to try it out.

In the beginning I talked to extremely friendly staff Vanessa, who was guiding us from the very be-ginning about the choice of room, attractions on the island and other things we can do during our time in Belitung.

I don’t know if it was because there were not so many people due to COVID 19 but the staff took really good care of us, like I have not seen before, every small request was fulfilled and they were greeting us with names and helping us with everything. Some of the staff at the restaurant, Connie, Alicia, Woran (I am not sure – with W) and couple of others that I forgot the names were always serving us promptly and always brought us with the gold cart to the room 

In the restaurant due to the low number of guests everything was prepared freshly, very tasty and the staff followed all the requirements we had. And I did not eat anything from the animals(vegan), my kids are very picky – so even though we had though requirements the staff was superb! It took a bit longer but it was made for us, nothing was precooked!!!

Further the staff (Debby) was helping us out with the Antigen test –info and was very helpful through the whole stay. The best option is to do it at the airport on the way back- easy and cheap!

In short: 
Hotel: Brand New facility, spacious rooms, gym, spa 
Staff: very good English and super friendly
Food:  very good
Location: A bit far from the city-but one of the best beaches I have ever seen, the sand is like pow-der and the water is clean.
Activities: the hotel can organize water sport activities, island hopping (much cheaper than the op-tions in the internet), sightseeing etc.

Jakarta- Belitung- 1 hour flight

Me, my wife and my kids really enjoyed it, there were no waves and the water was very warm and shallow so the kids could play not be afraid.

IT IS A MUST GO!!!
title: Excellent Stay in Sheraton Belitung

text:
I booked two nights here on the first week of December 2020 with the purpose of getting away from people and life, basically. So I was looking for the serenity and privacy and I definitely got it here. The hotel area was large, and the beach that was only accessible from the hotel was beautiful as well (picture included in this review—that was at the end of the shoreline).

The room was also great and even had a balcony with a tub (which is perfect for unwinding in your own...you can just space out while feeling good about yourself lol). Regarding the safety issues during COVID, other than the mandatory thorough cleaning, they also provided the guests with a sanitizing kit that contains two masks, two antibacterial wipes and a hand sanitizer. And during my stay here, for the first time in my life I used the hotel’s conditioner and it actually does work (it even smell nice). It applies to the lotion as well! The hair dryer in the bathroom also works fine and has two level of warm one cold mode.

However what I’m most satisfied about is the hospitality and the service from the staffs. It wasn’t just formalities when I talk to all the staffs there, I never had to repeat the things I prefer, and I can really appreciate the service they were providing during my stay there.

If there’s anything imperfect about my experience staying at Sheraton Belitung it might be just because of the unfinished landscape design of the hotel/the gardens. But instead of leaving me feeling dissatisfied, it actually makes me want to visit again when they’re completely finished and up and running. 

Keep up the great hospitality, please stay the same (or be better) when I visit again!
title: Just perfect.

text:
Stayed in Sheraton Belitung for 3 nights of wonderful family holiday.

The hotel is located around 40-minute drive from Belitung Airport, passing through the main town of the island.
It is in a rather secluded part of the island that is designated and planned as the special economic zone, where 5-stars hotels will be located (think of it like Bali's Nusa Dua in Belitung).
As it currently stands, Sheraton Belitung is still the only hotel already constructed and in operation in the area, so it's quite far from the nearest shop or any local restaurant.
But that also means a very serene environment with direct beach access that is as private as it can be.

The hotel concept is resort style, consisting of several 2-storeys buildings with expansive landscape in between.
The lobby feels pleasant, with open air design, and ample space that can easily accommodate many guests at the same time.
Checking-in was smooth with excellent recognition for Marriott Bonvoy member.
My praise for Pak Taufan and his front desk team (Bu Tina, and others) who had been a great help and assistance prior to and throughout our stay.

We had a room with view of the spectacular lagoon, something that gave a special experience compared to other resort/hotel with their normal sea/pool/garden view.
The room itself is very spacious, well-appointed with bright furnishing and excellent lighting.
It has lots of storage space which made it easy to store our big luggage and all the toys and equipment of our 2 young children.
Room was in general clean enough, considering the hotel was not even soft launched yet, although there were room for improvement.

Facilities in the hotel were still limited to swimming pool and the gym.
While we didn't have the chance to try out the gym due to having 2 young children, my family had so much fun in the vast swimming pool and the beach that they did not feel bored at all (a surprise as I was actually worried when I found out that the kids club was not open yet).
Only 1 restaurant was open, with the other one with the exciting concept of fresh seafood market directly from the fishermen still closed.
The restaurant was spacious with huge glass door/windows on all 3 sides which made the overall ambient very pleasant.
The crews were very friendly, communicative, and proactive, my particular praise for Pak Agung and Pak Aldy and the rest of the team.
Nevertheless, the distance to the nearest available local restaurant meant we had dined in the restaurant several times during our stay period and the menu should have more choice in order to avoid guests getting bored (I honestly didn't know what else to order, luckily the hotel had a BBQ night for our last dine-in).
Likewise, there were room for improvement that I would like to see in my next visit after the official launching.

Overall, Sheraton Belitung has great potential and well poised to be the leading hotel in Belitung, bringing tourism in the area to a new higher level.
Judging from the excellent hands-on of the GM that I got to see during my stay, and the enthusiast of the whole staffs in general, I am confident that Sheraton Belitung will meet the expectation.
title: Excellent New (and First?) 5-Star Hotel in Belitung

text: The property has the perfect and direct access to the beach with beautiful white sand and clear blue water on the island, located in Tanjung Binga, and overlooking the Lengkuas Island (where you can see the lighthouse from a far). My friend and I stayed for 3 nights and 4 days at one of the Ocean View rooms and felt quite happy with the services and facilities at the property.  Even though the hotel just launched/opened for public last September 2020, and is still having a soft launching, Ms. Yvonne and her team, from marketing/sales, front office/reception up to the coffee shop/Island Restaurant staff, strive to provide the best services during our stay.  Being the first 5 star hotel/eco-resort on the island, it will surely still need to improve the services as well as the facilities on-site (small details such as the signage to enter into the property from the main road, lighting along the entry road, the landscape - in particular on the lagoons and at the beach, and perhaps in-house transports/fleets which will be standby/available at the property to drive the guests around the island).  Overall, we had a pleasant stay and experience at Sheraton Belitung Resort and will definitely return!

text:
Auf einer kurzen "Expeditionsreise", um neue Inseln und Plätze in Indonesien zu entdecken, waren wir mit Freunden auch auf der wunderschönen Insel Belitung. Eine wunderbare Entdeckung. Nahezu einsame Traumstrände, superklares Wasser, riesige spektakuläre Granitfelsen. Die Menschen freundlich und entspannt. Keinerlei touristische oder sonstige Hektik, entspannter Strassenverkehr aud 1A ausgebauten Strassen.
Wir waren für 2 Tage/Nächte im Belitung Sheraton Resort. Ein wahres Eco Vorzeige-Ressort aus lokalen Materialien (Granit, Hölzer, etc) nachhaltig und durchdacht erbaut. Tolles Design von -wie mir erzählt wurde- von Aman nahestehenden Architekten.
Superfreundliche und bemühte Mitarbeiter. Üppiges Wassersport Angebot. Wir haben eine vom Hotel Bootsfahrt zum Sonnenuntergang auf eine benachbartes Inselchen unternommen. Sheraton hatte dafür auf den Riesenfelsen ein kleines Buffet aufgebaut. Superb. Am nächsten Tag buchten wir eine einstündige Bootsfahrt zu der Insel mit 700 Jahre alten Riesenmangroven - den ältesten der Welt. Man ist diesbezüglich im Disput mit Australien...
Das Belitung Sheraton wurde gerade während der Anfänge der Covid Pandemie eröffnet, und läuft jetzt meiner Beobachtung nach rund. Das Essen im Restarant ist ausgezeichnet. Sushi frisch aus dem Meer, Wagyu Steaks vom Grill. Seafood vom Feinsten.
Wir kommen sicherlich für einen längeren Aufenthalt ins Belitung Sheraton zurück, wahrscheinlich noch diesen Winter
title: Belitung Sheraton Resort - eine wunderbare Entdeckung auf der wunderschönen Insel Belitung

text:
Eckpunkte: Wir sind eine Familie mit Kleinkind. Wir waren 10 Nächte im Hotel und haben den Marriott Bonvoy Platinum Status.

Eigentlich sollte ich nur 1 Stern geben, damit niemand der das liest dieses wunderbare, einmalige und traumhafte Hotel betritt.

Es fängt schon vor der Anreise an, wo man gefragt wird ob man irgendwelche Wünsche hat oder man einen Airport Transfer benötigt.

Die guten Seelen des Hotels sind Maharani und Indri. Die beiden Damen erfüllen einen jeden Wunsch. Sind immer hilfsbereit und 24h im Notfall erreichbar.

Wir haben ein Upgrade in eine Suite beim einchecken bekommen. Welche wirklich groß ist. In der Suite gibt es sogar zwei vollständige Badezimmer.

Für die letzten drei Tage sind wir in eine Strandvilla mit eigenem Pool umgezogen. Ein Traum. Mir fehlen die Worte. Man fühlt sich, wie früher auf den Malediven.

Das beste ist, daß das Hotel nie ausgebucht ist. Im Durchschnitt sind nur 20 bis 30 Prozent des Hotels belegt. Die meisten Gäste  wohnen hier nur ein oder zwei Nächte. Die meisten Gäste kommen aus Indonesien, Japan und Korea. Europäische Gäste sind die Ausnahme werden aber wie Könige behandelt.

Jeder Mitarbeiter ist absolut freundlich und zuvorkommend. Ich muss gestehen, ich hatte in den letzten 20 Jahren keinen solchen perfekten Aufenthalt / Urlaub.

Der Spa Bereich ist ein Traum. Die Massagen absolut entspannend und wohltuend uns die zu einem günstigen Preis

Unser Sohn ist der Liebling der Mitarbeiter.
Jeder kennt ihn, jeder spielt mir ihn und jeder seiner Wünsche, wie z.B. frisch gepresster Apfelsaft zum Frühstück wird erfüllt.

Das Essen im Restaurant ist immer perfekt.
Man sitzt am Tisch und blickt auf das Meer und träumt vor sich hin. Die Speisenauswahl zum Frühstück ist sehr groß und wechselt jeden Tag. Eiergerichte werden auf Wunsch frisch zubereitet.

Es gibt über 70 Angestellte die nur darauf warten sie glücklich zu machen.

Vergessen sie Mauritius, vergessen sie Bali.
Das ist nichts im Vergleich zu diesem Hotel.

Wir möchten eigentlich von hier gar nicht weg. Ein was ist sicher wir werden bald wieder kommen
title: Best stay in the last 20 years
